title: üëãAbout

content: Nstorm E-commerce Website, clone of Nordstorm. live | github Python | JavaScript | Flask | React | Redux | aws | SQLAlchemy Implemented features such as product browsing, detailed product information, which allow users to easily browse and make purchases from a variety of products in different categories.Facilitated the checkout process by providing the feature of adding items to cart, adjusting quantities of items in the cart, reviewing the order and entering shipping address information.Built a reviews and ratings system to allow users to share their experiences and provide feedback of purchase, which utilized AWS storage service to store user-uploaded review imagesRobinhold Stock Website, clone of Robinhood. live | github Python | JavaScript | Flask | React | Redux | SQLAlchemy Collaborated with group members to complete this project, implemented features such as displaying stock price change and deposit funds into accounts, add/remove stocks in the watchlist. Utilized the React-plotly library to implement interactive chart and visualization.Incorporated fund and transaction feature, allowing users to easily add funds to their account, then buy and sell stocks as they wanted.Airbvb Home-sharing Website, clone of Airbnb live | github JavaScript | Express.js | React | Redux | Sequelize Utilized Google Maps API to display properties on the map view and enable users to zoom in and out to get a better understanding of the location.Developed a booking functionality that allows users to easily browse the availability of rooms, book their stays and manage bookings.Hosted on Heroku.com to enable easy access and user-friendly interface.
summary: Nstorm E-commerce Website, clone of Nordstorm. live | github Python | JavaScript | Flask | React | Redux | aws | SQLAlchemy Implemented features such as product browsing, detailed product information, which allow users to easily browse and make purchases from a variety of products in different categories.Facilitated the checkout process by providing the feature of adding items to cart, adjusting quantities of items in the cart, reviewing the order and entering shipping address information.
